description: A Japanese martial art known for it's kiai called Enkyo, it is a style that focuses purely on downwards strike attacks.
initiate: You hold your sword vertically above your right shoulder, prepared to strike down.

static_buffs.name: Tonbo-no-kamae
static_buffs.description:
With your sword standing high above,
you are ready to strike down everything blocking your path.

Armor penetration increased by 50% of Strength, +2 accuracy.

onhit_buffs.name: Tategi-uchi
onhit_buffs.description:
You practiced hitting a wooden post repeatedly,
and now you enter a zen like mind when doing it.

-1.0 Dodging skill, +5% critical hit chance.
Lasts 1 turn.  Stacks 5 times.
